Hextech Capacitor.name: Hextech Capacitor
Hextech Capacitor.blurb: After casting Transform Jayce gains 40 Movement Speed and can move through units for the next 1.25 seconds.
Hextech Capacitor.description: Innate: Each time Jayce switches between  Hammer Stance and  Cannon Stance he is  ghosted and gains  40 bonus movement speed for 1.25 seconds.

To the Skies!.name: To the Skies!
To the Skies!.blurb: Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies.
To the Skies!.description: Active: Jayce  leaps to the target enemy and smashes his hammer on the ground on top of them, dealing  physical damage to all enemies in the  area and  slowing them for 2 seconds.
To the Skies!.notes: * To The Skies! will always direct Jayce linearly to his target's location.

Shock Blast.name: Shock Blast
Shock Blast.blurb: Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.
Shock Blast.description: Active: Jayce fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy or reaching the end of its path, dealing physical damage to all enemies around them.
Shock Blast.description2: If Shock Blast is fired through  Acceleration Gate, the range and damage are increased by 40%, and the speed by 30.34%.
Shock Blast.notes:
*  Acceleration Gate retargets Shock Blast in order to extend its travel path even further.
 Shock Blast briefly grants  sight of the area it explodes in.

Lightning Field.name: Lightning Field
Lightning Field.blurb: Hammer Stance: Passive: Restores Mana per strike. Active: Creates a field of lightning damaging nearby enemies for several seconds.
Lightning Field.description: Passive: Jayce restores  mana each time he hits an enemy with a basic attack with  Mercury Hammer.
Lightning Field.description2: Active: Jayce surrounds himself with an electric field for 4 seconds, dealing  magic damage each second to all nearby enemies.
Lightning Field.notes: * Lightning Field has no cast time and does not interrupt Jayce's previous orders.

Hyper Charge.name: Hyper Charge
Hyper Charge.blurb: Cannon Stance: Gains a burst of energy, increasing Attack Speed to maximum for several attacks.
Hyper Charge.description: Active: Jayce gains  300% bonus attack speed on his next 3 basic attacks within 4 seconds, with each one dealing modified damage.
Hyper Charge.description2: Hyper Charge resets Jayce's basic attack timer, and the modified damage is affected by  critical strikes.
Hyper Charge.notes:
* Hyper Charge has no cast time and do not interrupt Jayce's previous orders.
  Cooldown starts after the third attack is consumed or the duration ends.
 The last basic attack is dealt as on-hit rather than on-attack
 If  Runaan's Hurricane or  Guinsoo's Rageblade hit the target before the basic attack does, the basic attack damage will not be modified.

Thundering Blow.name: Thundering Blow
Thundering Blow.blurb: Hammer Stance: Deals magic damage to an enemy and knocks them back a short distance.
Thundering Blow.description: Active: Jayce swings his hammer at the target enemy, dealing magic damage and  knocking them back 500 units away in the opposite direction.

Acceleration Gate.name: Acceleration Gate
Acceleration Gate.blurb: Cannon Stance: Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the Movement Speed of all allied champions who pass through it. If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase.
Acceleration Gate.description: Active: Jayce deploys an energy gate for 4 seconds, granting all allies who pass through it, including himself,  bonus movement speed that decays over 3 seconds.
Acceleration Gate.notes:
* Acceleration Gate has no  cast time and does not interrupt Jayce's previous orders.
 The bonus movement speed does not apply to  pets and  minions.
 Acceleration Gate grants brief  sight of the area.

Transform Mercury Cannon.name: Transform Mercury Cannon
Transform Mercury Cannon.blurb: Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist.
Transform Mercury Cannon.description: Active: Jayce transforms the  Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon, gaining access to its abilities, having  ranged attacks with 500  range, and causing his next basic attack to reduce his target's  armor and  magic resistance by 10 / 15 / 20 / 25% (based on level) for 5 seconds.
Transform Mercury Cannon.description2: Jayce begins the game with Transform but cannot increase its rank. Instead, his basic abilities each have 6 ranks.
Transform Mercury Cannon.notes:
* Transform has no cast time and does not interrupt Jayce's previous orders.
 The resistance reduction does not apply to structures.
 Transform does not count as an activation for the purposes of Mana Charge, Spellblade, or  Force Pulse.
 Both Transform on-hit effects have no set duration and will only be consumed when Jayce either lands a basic attack or switches stances.
 The respective on-hit effects will not be consumed if the respective enhanced attacks are  blocked,  dodged,  parried, or if they  miss.
 Transform's on-hit effects will not proc on wards.

Transform Mercury Hammer.name: Transform Mercury Hammer
Transform Mercury Hammer.blurb: Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.
Transform Mercury Hammer.description: Active: Jayce transforms the  Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer, gaining new abilities, becoming  melee with  125 range, gaining 5 / 15 / 25 / 35 (based on level)  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance, and causing his next basic attack to deal 25 / 65 / 105 / 145 (based on level) (+ 25% bonus AD) bonus magic damage.
Transform Mercury Hammer.description2: Jayce begins the game with Transform but cannot increase its rank. Instead, his basic abilities each have 6 ranks.
Transform Mercury Hammer.notes:
* Transform has no cast time and does not interrupt Jayce's previous orders.
 Transform does not count as an activation for the purposes of Mana Charge, Spellblade, or  Force Pulse.
 The respective on-hit effects will not be consumed if the respective enhanced attacks are  blocked,  dodged,  parried, or if they  miss.
 The Mercury Hammer's bonus damage can affect structures.
 Both Transform on-hit effects have no set duration and will only be consumed when Jayce either lands a basic attack or switches stances.
 Transform's on-hit effects will not proc on wards.
